CustomField.formula: ( IF (Create_lead__c = false , 0 , 1 ) + IF ( Receive_lead__c = false , 0 , 1 ) + IF ( Allocate_Talent_Coach__c = false , 0 , 1 ) + IF ( Allocate_Talent_Agent__c = false , 0 , 1 ) + IF( PE_Appt_booked__c = false , 0 , 1 ) + IF( PE_Appt_completed__c = false , 0 , 1 ) + IF( PE_assessment_setup__c = false , 0 , 1 ) + IF( Send_email_with_MP_link_login_info__c = false , 0 , 1 ) + IF( Follow_up_on_PE_assessment__c = false , 0 , 1 ) + IF(PE_assessment_completed__c = false , 0 , 1 ) + IF( Attach_PE_assessment_to_lead_record__c = false , 0 , 1 ) + IF( Book_PE_assessment_FU_meeting__c = false , 0 , 1 ) + IF( Send_PE_assessment_FU_meeting_reminder__c = false , 0 , 1 ) + IF( PE_assessment_FU_meeting_completion__c = false , 0 , 1 ) + IF( Give_send_application_procedures_link__c = false , 0 , 1 ) + IF( Follow_up_on_Application_progression__c = false , 0 , 1 ) + IF( Application_completed_received__c = false , 0 , 1 ) + IF( Review_Process_Applications__c = false , 0 , 1 ) + IF(Offer_extended__c = false , 0 , 1 ) + IF( Offer_accepted_or_declined__c = false , 0 , 1 ) + IF( Offer_deferred__c = false , 0 , 1 ) + IF( Payment_received_or_assured_by_employer__c = false , 0 , 1 ) + IF( Receipt_issued__c = false , 0 , 1 ) + IF( Registered__c = false , 0 , 1 ) + IF( Generate_Student_ID_in_SIS__c = false , 0 , 1 ) + IF( Transfer_Student_Record_Number_to_CRM__c = false , 0 , 1 ) / 1 ) / 26
